short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cozy browser extension to add a garland to any page. Happy Christmas and New Year!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get into the festive spirit with our cozy browser extension designed to add a touch of holiday magic to any webpage you visit! Whether you're browsing your favorite news site, shopping online, or catching up on social media, our extension will drape a beautiful garland across the top of your screen, instantly transforming any page into a winter wonderland.

Imagine the joy of seeing a festive garland adorn your everyday online activities. It's like having a little piece of Christmas and New Year cheer with you wherever you go on the web. The garland is elegantly designed to complement any website, adding a subtle yet delightful holiday vibe without disrupting your browsing experience.

This extension is perfect for anyone who loves the holiday season and wants to spread a bit of festive joy. It's easy to install and even easier to useâ€”just a click away from turning any webpage into a celebration of the season.

So, why wait? Bring the spirit of Christmas and New Year to your digital world with our cozy garland browser extension. Happy holidays!
